idea-plugin.description: Supports integration with The Bug Genie (3.x) issue tracking system. To configure synchronization between an TBG system and IntelliJ IDEA choose type of server and enter credentials. IntelliJ IDEA will automatically synchronize the tasks.
idea-plugin.name: IntelliJ task integration for The Bug Genie issue tracker
